title: Remove Home page hero headline block

requirements.summary: Remove the Home page hero headline text block while keeping the remaining hero label, supporting paragraph, and CTA buttons visually balanced.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Home page hero section, the text "SIDEHUSL AI, BUILD YOUR SIDE HUSTLE TODAY!" is not rendered anywhere.
The hero section still displays the "AI-Powered App Builder" label, the supporting paragraph, and both CTA buttons, without awkward extra spacing where the headline used to be.
No other pages or global navigation elements are changed.

file_operations.description: Remove the <h1> block that renders the hero headline text "SIDEHUSL AI, BUILD YOUR SIDE HUSTLE TODAY!" and adjust the hero content stack spacing (e.g., the container's spacing utilities and/or CTA top padding) so the remaining label, paragraph, and buttons remain centered and visually balanced without a noticeable gap.
